what.title: What is OOPS?
what.body: Out of Parent's Shape — a fitness program built for time-strapped parents. Short sessions, no equipment, science-backed. Everything works offline and no data is ever sent anywhere.

method.title: The method
method.body: The program is based on FITT-VP principles (Frequency, Intensity, Time, Type, Volume, Progression) from kinesiology:
method.patterns_body: Push, Pull, Squat, Hinge, Core & Mobility — all muscle groups covered without unnecessary repetition.
method.overload_body: We increase volume (reps, sets) before intensity. Your body adapts at its own pace.
method.rpe_body: Beginner target: 5–7 / 10. You should feel the effort without burning out.
method.recovery_body: 48h minimum between sessions targeting the same muscle groups. Rest is part of the program.

postpartum.title: Postpartum program
postpartum.body: Postpartum profiles exclude classic ab exercises (crunches) to avoid diastasis recti risk. Priority goes to pelvic floor work and a slower ramp-up over at least 6 weeks. Always consult your doctor before starting.

privacy.title: Your data
privacy.body: OOPS collects no data. Your profile, sessions and history are stored only on your device via IndexedDB. No server, no account, no tracking.
